title: go.tools/cmd/vet: locate infinite recursion in String methods.
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
a.go is located at http://play.golang.org/p/vdafbuF0zB
Running it on playground results in "fatal error: out of memory
(stackcacherefill)"

1. go vet a.go
2. inspect output.

What is the expected output?
a.go:15: arg t for printf verb %v causes infinite String method recursion.

What do you see instead?
No output.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Arch Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +9eb1dd061b1f Tue Aug 13 13:01:30 2013 +0400 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.
go.tools version:
239:44387735a77d
